Description: New Vera Bradley Grand Tote Style - 14421-132 - Ribbons with Pink Interior Features Condition: New - With Tags Style Number: 14421-132 Style Color: Ribbons with Solid Pink Interior Hardware Finish: N/A Exterior Material: Wrapped in Vera's iconic Ribbons print on soft quilted fabric Interior Material: Pink fabric Exterior Description: Vera's durable and spacious Grand Tote is made of soft quilted fabric with a removable sturdy fabric covered bottom insert. The Grand Tote is versatile - use it as an overnight bag, for a day by the pool or at the beach, the gym, dance or gymnastics for yourself or for children. You can flip the bottom insert up on its side, and you have a much narrower commuting or daily work bag. It makes a great weekend get-away bag or for travel. Interior Description: It features a spacious interior with a hanging zippered pocket and a completely open top to allow maximum flexibility with packing. Length: 16 inches long at the bottom and tapers to 23 inches long at the top Width: 7.5 Inches Height: 15 Inches Strap Drop: The dual straps have a comfortable drop of about 12 inches Additional Information: It is lightweight, and easily maintained and it can be placed in the wash.
